Title: Introducing Threads
introduction: We pushed our latest update to improve the observability of chatlogs. Now, you can group logs by thread ID to have a better understanding of the conversation flow.

New.description: Added a test button on the credential card for users to verify their credentials.
Added JSON mode display, open in playground, and message editing in the side panel.
Added the Delete button in the side panel.
Added filters on the Datasets page. You can now filter your data by dataset ID, system message, user message, and assistant message.
Added sorting on the Datasets page. You can now sort data by updated time and dataset ID.
You can now export your user data to a CSV/JSONL file.

Improved.description: Improved display of log messages in the side panel; now, you will be directed to the last message when you click on a log.
Improved JSON model display in the side panel.

Fixed.description: Fixed the bug where enabled compare mode, but the left message glitched and disappeared.
